entity.name: Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.

🌍Updates: 15 NY children diagnosed with syndrome possibly tied to COVID-19

📈 By the numbers: Data to understand the impact 
💫 Positivity: Turkish sheep take to the streets
✅ Fact-check: Misinformation debunked 
📝 Lists: Accounts to follow

text:
Very encouraging randomized trial results for interferon β-1b in mild to moderate #COVID19: marked reduction viral shedding, symptoms, hospital stay; safe, (on top of protease inhibitors) @TheLancet Bigger RCT needed but👍
https://t.co/BFpQZEWsh0 https://t.co/5QR7PZVzzk
